name: Noise generator
description: This algorithm is a simple noise generator. Various standard “colours” of noise can be generated.
gui_description: The interface provides global gain control and per-channel settings for output routing, amplitude, individual channel gain, noise color selection (with blend control for blended mode), and standard add/replace output mode.

specifications.name: Channels
specifications.description: The number of output channels supported by the algorithm (1-8).

parameters.name: Blend
parameters.description: If "Blended" is selected, sets the blend between noise colours.

output_ports.name: Output_Audio
output_ports.description: Audio output port for generated noise signal (1-8 channels)

output_ports.name: Output
output_ports.description: The output bus for the noise signal.
